sub_title: Board Room Advisor - Innovation and Technology - Blockchain, Smart Contracts, DAO & Governance Expert - International Keynote Speaker
summary:
I help companies of all sizes to be prepared for upcoming technologies like Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Big Data and the impact on their business.
We train, do research, coach companies, from start up to corporate, Specialized in sustainable blockchain and smart contract implementations with special focus on governance. 

I am a key note speaker on blockchain and especially Smart Contracts. Besides I advise various blockchain start ups and  am very actively involved in the Dutch Blockchain Coalition

Prior I've worked in the finance sector, government sector, logistics sector, consumer goods manufacturing/production industry and health care industry. In these industries I obtained various experiences. In these industries I both worked as manager and on an individual basis as consultant.

Throughout my career I have obtained experience in:
- Managing sourcing, facilities, quality and commercial departments and project management offices.
- Strategy and Reorganization implementations
- Business Process Management,
- Project, Program and PMO management
- Business consultancy in process improvement (ToC, Lean, TQM, Six Sigma),
- Design and writing strategy and implementation/project plans,
- (Re-) Engineering of business processes (Based on TOC and Lean Manufacturing),
- Business Continuity Management /Crisis Management/Disaster Recovery in highly regulated environments,
- Records and Information Management
- Large scale IT and business projects (SEPA implementation, M&A deals, Bank Closure, etc)
- Development of a range of continuous improvement and data analysis tools,

Specialties: Blockchain, Business Process Management, Operations Management, SEPA, Business Process (re-)design, Lean and Six Sigma, Supply Chain Management/Architecture, Business & Management Consultancy, Project Management, PMO, Business Continuity Management, Records & Information Management.
